title: Relax, Relax~
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Eli-chan, I think it’s amazing how you always seem so dignified, but isn’t it tiring?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I don’t think that I’m being that dignified. This much is normal….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Why don’t you relax like Kanata-chan once in a while~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh….? How exactly….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Umm~, getting a knee pillow from Karin-chan, getting petted by Emma-chan, take a nap while being hugged by Rina-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Aren’t Nijigaku too sweet for you, Kanata?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Is that so? Isn’t this much normal? Eli-chan should also try it~. Umm-, getting a knee pillow from Nozomi-chan, getting petted by Honoka-chan, taking a nap while being hugged by Rin-chan, how does that sound?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I think Nozomi won’t end with just a knee pillow, Honoka would likely fall asleep on top of me, Rin can’t stay still…. If so, then maybe a knee pillow from Kotori, a pet from Hanayo… something like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It doesn’t hurt to try~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>It’s-, it’s impossible!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
